text:
@realDonaldTrump It isn’t stupid, it’s a safety measure.  COVID-19 is an infectious disease that can spread through close contact at places like polling booths.  

You should be more concerned about the safety and health of the people of this country than your 2nd term.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
